attributes.action: Give us scientific data to prove schools are safe to open
attributes.additional_details: So us as parents can see if it is safe to put our children in a school environment.
attributes.background: Explain why you have to close pubs and restaurants if our kids are apparently safe and won't spread disease. Also explain why you yourself are still not sitting in Parliament.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. You might like to know that the House of Commons is currently sitting in Westminster. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
